overview:
George Hu has been an Executive Vice President of Marketing of Salesforce.com since February 2009. Mr. Hu served as Executive Vice President of Marketing, Applications & Education of Salesforce.com from December 2007 to February 2009. He served as Chief Marketing Officer of Salesforce.com from October 2006 to December 2007.

He joined salesforce.com in 2002 and has served in a variety of management roles and served as its Vice President of Product Marketing from October 2004 to January 2006, and Senior Vice President of Applications from January 2006 to October 2006.

In these capacities, Mr. Hu led the broadening of the Salesforce.com’s product portfolio into customer service & support and partner relationship management, launched breakthrough new products including salesforce.com’s Unlimited Edition, and driven the creation of innovative new concepts such as Successforce.com and IdeaExchange.

He held product management and strategic consulting roles at North Point Communications and Boston Consulting Group. He serves as a Director of FinancialForce.com Inc.

Mr. Hu holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in Economics from Harvard College and a Master of Business Administration from the Stanford Graduate School of Business of Stanford University.
